articles.title: Galaxy G Fold, Samsung’s Tri-Fold Flagship To Rival The Mate XT, Is Rumored To Launch Q3 2025, With A 30 Percent Bigger Display Than The Galaxy Z Fold 6 - Wccftech
articles.description: A tipster reveals that Samsung will unveil its first tri-fold smartphone, the Galaxy G Fold, in the third quarter of 2025
articles.content: Samsung was definitely caught off-guard when Huawei went ahead and announced the industrys commercially available tri-fold smartphone called the Mate XT, which is a testament to the Chinese firms gri… [+2061 chars]
